raw_comment:
What do I notice?
After closely looking at the graphs I notice that the National Football league has the lowest percentages of head coaches than the Major league soccer. I also notice that all these graphs are information from 2020 while the Women's National basketball association is information from 2019. 

What do you wonder?
Why is the amount of head coaches of color is so little?

What impact does this have on you and your community? 
Racism is a big and serious issue, and by looking at the graphs I can see that national sports aren't inclusive enough. People would much rather join a sport with people like them then one without.

What's going on in this graph?
Lack of diversity in the field
ace_sentences: I looked closely at the graphs.
The National Football League has the lowest percentage of head coaches of color.
Major League Soccer has a higher percentage of head coaches of color than the National Football League.
The graph about the Women's National Basketball Association contains information from 2019.
I wonder why the number of head coaches of color is so small.
The graphs show that national sports are not inclusive enough.
A person prefers to join a sport if the sport has people like the person.
A person prefers not to join a sport if the sport does not have people like the person.
The graph shows a lack of diversity in the field.
